Sequence Information.Peptide Name: HRNR1132–1143 (Hornerin-derived Ser-rich; natural AMPs; human; primates; mammals; animals; CIDAMP; UCLL1a; more AMPs?)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that the sequence of the peptide shows 38.6% similarity toCarnocin UI49.This is a unique sequence rich in serine, glycine, chracteristic of inherently disordered polypeptides (herein named as cationic intrinsically disordered AMPs, CIDAMP).Activity: Active against P. aeruginosa.
Literature Information.Author: Gerstel U, Latendorf T, Bartels J, Becker A, Tholey A, Schröder JM.2018
Literature Information.Title: Hornerin contains a Linked Series of Ribosome-Targeting Peptide Antibiotics.
